# id: MongoDbBasicConverters -> private static boolean isBson(byte[] input)
commentText: If the input starts with any number of whitespace characters and then a '{' character, we_assume it is JSON rather than BSON. There are probably no useful BSON blobs that fit this pattern
codeText: private static boolean isBson(byte[] input) {_		int i = 0__		while (i < input.length) {_			if (input[i] == '{') {_				return false__			} else if (!Character.isWhitespace(input[i])) {_				return true__			}_		}_		return true__	}
